text: ab vahee log, jo kal usake pad kee kaamana kar rahe the, kahane lagen, "afasos ham bhool gae the ki allaah apane bandon mein se jisake lie chaahata hai rozee kushaada karata hai aur jise chaahata hai napee-tulee deta hai. yadi allaah ne hamapar upakaar na kiya hota to hamen bhee dhansa deta. afasos ham bhool gae the ki inakaar karanevaale saphal nahin hua karate.
